data.title: The Spirit of the West Radio Show, with Hugh McLennan, brings you the Best in Western Music, Cowboy Poetry, and Rangland News
data.meta_description:
The Spirit of the West Radio Show, with Hugh McLennan, brings 
you the Best in Western Music, Cowboy Poetry, and Rangland News
data.text:
Read the testimonials for Spirit of the West Radio Show here

Hugh McLennan combined his many years of professional broadcasting wirh the experience of working with horses and cattle under western skies into a multi award-winning radio show bringing the cowboy experience to the world with his weekly radio program and Internet broadcast.

Tune in each week for Hugh's one hour Spirit of the West radio show featuring contemporary and traditional music of the West and guests from the world of working ranchers, cowboys, veterinarians, horse trainers and others who have wonderful stories to share. Hear helpful and savvy horse training advice, entertaining cowboy poetry and news from the rangeland.

Tune in each week!

The Spirit of the West has developed a dedicated following on the radio and now on the World Wide Web. Join Hugh with a Windows Media Player and experience the Spirit of the West!

Hear the Spirit of the West radio show

THE SPIRIT OF THE WEST is the best way

to use RADIO to reach your customers

Find out how you can advertise

A syndicated weekly radio program featuring:

Contemporary and traditional music of the west.

Real working cowboys, ranchers, horse trainers, vets & others.

Horse training advice.

Cowboy poetry

News from the rangeland.
